p: The n‐3 CH 2‐CH 3 spin system was simulated and verified with a pulse acquired sequence with a 2 msec rectangular pulse and TE < 1 msec in the NMRScope‐B tool in the jMRUI package. 19, 20 The symmetric PRESS sequence with Hermite pulses and RF pulses centered at 1 ppm was simulated with TEs of 30 (shortest TE for PRESS) and 1000 msec (ultralong TE) for one spin, to replicate the effect of RF pulse bandwidths with ideal localization, and a 1 mL isotropic voxel, for realistic RF pulse effects and localization.
